basics.name: Nick Vigilante
basics.label: Software Engineer/Technical Writer
basics.summary: I like to write docs and code stuff. I have a proven track record of improving docs systems and automating processes. I'm always looking for new opportunities in technical writing and software engineering.

work.name: Cockroach Labs
work.summary: Maintained and enhanced the infrastructure surrounding CRL's product documentation
highlights: Improve UX and SEO of our documentation site by way of structured data modifications, link standardization, and various enhancements to testing and linting tools
Create and modify Go code responsible for process automation, data governance of our docs repo, and commit message compliance
Reduce toil for managers triaging issues by automatically associating work items with Jira epics
Deliver frequent internal documentation updates and training seminars to the documentation team to help bolster existing skills and improve their productivity in their roles
Orchestrate enterprise software trials for various hosting platforms to improve site availability and reduce site build times by over 35%
Improve search experience to bring end users to their desired content quicker and more reliably through Algolia
Provide tooling assistance to writers to ensure a frictionless contribution experience
Reviewed Jira, Slack, and other data sources to drive improvements to the documentation

work.name: Cockroach Labs
highlights: Liaised with various engineering teams about new features and functionality to document about CockroachDB
Reviewed Jira, Slack, and other data sources to drive improvements to the documentation
Created procedural documentation related to migrating data to CockroachDB
Submitted regular release notes to highlight product changes across releases

Enhanced internal tooling and documentation surrounding release note generation to reduce writer toil for generating release notes and improve user experience when reading release notes by combining releases for a single version onto a single page

work.name: TCT, Inc
work.summary: Developed full-stack SQL-based compensation management applications in the beqom platform for clients in the financial services industry
highlights: Create and modify stored procedures, functions, tables, views, and other database objects to support new business requirements, in addition to making various database customizations
Work closely with regulatory teams and project management to gather requirements and develop applications and test cases that match expected compensation values
Create best practices, documentation, and training for end users and other developers
Provide mentorship and training to new developers on various parts of the beqom platform
Liaise with vendor product and roadmap teams to communicate product improvements and issues/pain points from clients
Operate and develop in both Agile and DevOps methodologies

work.name: AFAK Solutions, LLC
highlights: Provided hardware and software infrastructure support for and upgrades to existing systems
Performed content structural review and enhancements of existing slide decks and course material for professional development training

work.name: Appian Corporation
work.summary: Knowledge Base architect, subject matter expert, Appian development, cloud infrastructure support
highlights: Analyzed customer log data to track trends in usage and identify problems within the platform
Created and maintained product knowledge base, contributing over 200 articles on product issues, how-to guides, best practices, and troubleshooting common issues
Submitted updates to the product documentation adhering to the Microsoft style guide
Administration and development of customer and employee facing systems, including a complete overhaul of product licensing application
Collaborated with engineering and cloud teams to share product pain points, high-profile code issues, and product enhancements
Managed a team of engineers focused on application design and end-user interface concepts
Provided expert-level assistance and application design recommendations to customers, partners, and fellow employees
Liaise with premium support customers on a regular basis to offer guidance, preventative maintenance, and strategic suggestions that help maximize the value of the platform

work.name: MicroStrategy, Inc
work.summary: Subject matter expert for technical support engineers
highlights: Worked as a product expert who can be depended on to solve the most difficult technical cases and defuse critical customer situations

Used well-developed technical and customer management skills, along with the ability to interact well with the QEs and software developers and involvement with internal Cloud infrastructure to provide support for MicroStrategy's customers
Specialized in database-related issues as well as mobile application-related issues
Provided training to members of the department to further enhance knowledge of other engineers

work.name: MicroStrategy, Inc
highlights: Provide complex and challenging support for MicroStrategy's Business Intelligence product suite and its underlying technologies
Develop strong relationships with MicroStrategy customers and partners through daily interactions during customer project development and production system maintenance
Find creative and sophisticated solutions to problems reported while using MicroStrategy's product suite through analytical talent and strong troubleshooting abilities
Work in a strong team environment to provide unparalleled support to customers in a wide variety of industries
Prioritize and communicate product defects and enhancements to development teams
Contribute to research and growth of the MicroStrategy Knowledge Base by creating customer-facing documentation of all technical solutions and product documentation addenda

volunteer.summary: Co-chair of the LGBTQIA+ employee resource group at Cockroach Labs dedicated to helping friends and loved ones of LGBTQIA+ individuals as well as LGBTQIA+ employees
highlights: Hosted virtual and in-person company-wide happy hours
Co-hosted a volunteer event to pack snack packs; donated said snack packs to the Ali Forney Center in NYC to benefit LGBTQIA+ youth experiencing food insecurity
Oversaw a committee of volunteers who contributed blog posts, created company swag, and led various events for the company

courses: Art and Science of Mathematics I
